output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the required criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CUI mandatar financiar coordonator: 11240017"
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" as presidential candidate
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions)
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly states support for Marcel Ciolacu in presidential elections ("vom susține... pe domnul președinte Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidențiale")
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication from PSD Gorj, with paid distribution
The post explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu as a presidential candidate, which is problematic since the presidential campaign period has ended. While the post also mentions parliamentary elections (which are still in campaign period), the inclusion of presidential election messaging makes this a violation.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Contains official party messaging - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Has clear electoral objective - Contains CMF number indicating campaign material - Combines legitimate parliamentary campaign with prohibited presidential campaign messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Gorj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul la presedintie Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, prin intermediul unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 888133213528318) ce continua sa fie activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea contine in mod explicit indemnul de sustinere a candidatului la presedintie Marcel Ciolacu ("vom susține... pe domnul președinte Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidențiale"), reprezinta propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) prin prezenta CMF-ului, targetarea publicului larg prin reclama platita, si obiectivul electoral explicit de influentare a votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale.
